CountedEfficiency.title: CountedEfficiency
CountedEfficiency.description: Filter efficiency based the particle counts concentration before and after filter against particles with certain size distribution.

WeightedEfficiency.title: WeightedEfficiency
WeightedEfficiency.description: Filter efficiency based the particle weight concentration before and after filter against particles with certain size distribution.

ParticleMassHolding.title: ParticleMassHolding
ParticleMassHolding.description: Mass of particle holding in the filter.
